name: Haunting (itch)
description:
This is Haunting, a game I made for my Final Year Project in Game Art and Design at Limerick Institute of Technology.

The game is very short and was made by just myself over a period of seven months. 

I focused on creating a good atmosphere based on how I felt moving back home after living on my own for a few years before Covid-19, and how my childhood home didn't feel like home anymore.

The game was made in Unreal Engine 4 using Quixel Megascan and custom assets made in Blender, Houdini and Zbrush. 

Hope you enjoy ^_^

All audio was taken from Freesound.org and I will be linking them all here as they are very good and I wish to give them full credit.

https://freesound.org/s/408110/ "Humming.wav" by AngelicWings

https://freesound.org/s/185618/ "PickupKey.wav" by maty_rs 

https://freesound.org/s/403351/ "Door_Hinge.flac" by corpocracy

https://freesound.org/s/369704/ "Door Creek" by Mrguff

https://freesound.org/s/346641/ "Rain on Windows, Interior, B.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

https://freesound.org/s/85687/ "Footsteps_Creeky_Wood.aif" by tmkappelt
